positive_examples: This is an example of knowledge graph.
The knowledge graph demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed knowledge graph in this context.
A typical case of knowledge graph would involve these features.
The concept of knowledge graph applies here.
A structured representation of interconnected entities, their attributes, and relationships in a domain of knowledge.
negative_examples: This is an example of neural activation network, not knowledge graph.
This represents conceptual network in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NeuralActivationNetwork, or other types of ConceptualNetwork

definition: A structured representation of facts using entities and their relationships.
